document_data.name: Elar
document_data.mainbody: '''Elar''' was a [[Shadovar]] soldier and a member of the reconnaissance patrol led by [[Parth Gal]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. The unit served at the leisure of [[Escanor Tanthul]], [[Princes of Shade|Prince]] of [[Thultanthar]].
document_data.History: Elar was was killed along with all the other Shadovar in his unit during an ill-fated expedition to [[Myth Drannor]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}. The Shadovar scouts were tracking [[phaerimm]] activity beneath the ruined [[Irithlium]] and each met a gruesome death. Elar, Parth Gal, and several others were downed by [[elven]] traps that shot hidden darts out from the walls of the ruined catacombs.
